subject: Citi Field (NYC)
lead_paragraph: It was unclear if Piazza’s reluctance to talk was connected to allegations of steroid use in a recently published book, “The Rocket That Fell to Earth,” by Jeff Pearlman.
snippet: It was unclear if Piazza’s reluctance to talk was connected to allegations of steroid use in a recently published book, “The Rocket That Fell to Earth,” by Jeff Pearlman.
